Summary: I saw a morphing UFO flashing colored bright lights flying low in the sky in a wobbly descending flight path.
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Westminster
There were no other sightings in Westminster on or around February 28th 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsHeading down Westminster Blvd. traveling East toward Golden West St. . I noticed unusual flashing lights in the sky to my left looking North. At first glance I thought it was a helicopter. As it was flying closer to me heading in a South East direction under 500ft. in the sky. I soon realized it was not a helicopter or plane ! It was morphing and changing shape as it flew kind of wobbly through the sky. The whole time emitting bright red and white lights all over it. The object was solid, yet constantly changing shape. It almost appeared to be in distress to make a landing somewhere.When I saw this happening I was kind of in shock! The object appeared to go very low in the sky and then disappeared out of my view looking South East. This all occurred in day light facing away from the direction of the sun. The event lasted 3-5 minutes, did not get pictures with cell phone.
